movie-description: 20 years ago the small town of Louisville, Ohio was stunned by the gruesome death of a local teenage girl. The case was shrouded in mystery and never resolved. The only man who knows the terrible secret of what happened that night wanders the streets in silence. When a group of meddling high school kids get too curious about the mystery, they inadvertently resurrect the evil. Now, no one is safe and only one thing is for sure- the town of Louisville will never be the same.
movie-short-description: Directed by Andrew Campbell, Lucas Campbell.
